mapper.select: select product_no, product_name, product_price, product_img from product order by product_no desc
mapper.update: update product set product_hitcount=#{product_hitcount} where product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.insert: insert into pinquiry( pinquiry_no, pinquiry_title, pinquiry_content, pinquiry_type, product_product_no, users_users_id, pinquiry_createdDate ) values( pinquiry_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pinquiry_title}, #{pinquiry_content}, #{pinquiry_type}, #{product_product_no}, #{users_users_id}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') )
mapper.select: select count(*) from pinquiry where product_product_no=#{product_no}
select count(*) from product where product_name like '%' || #{search} || '%'
SELECT product_no, product_name, product_price FROM product WHERE product_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select p.product_no as product_product_no, i.image_file as image_file from product p, image i where p.product_no = i.product_product_no and product_product_no = #{product_no} and i.image_name like '%상품' || #{product_no} || '%'

select p.product_no as product_product_no, i.image_no as image_no from product p, image i where p.product_no = i.product_product_no and product_product_no = #{product_no} and i.image_name like '%detail%'
